namuth athi wu yaha palanayak natha. 94dida apata awasi wuye yaha palanayak wuwada owun apata laba dunne thrasthawadiyata thrasthawadiya lesinwath amathiya nohaki wu biyagulu jathiyaki. 2002dida apata awasiwuye yaha palanaya wuwada owun laba dunne 75%k bedu rataki. 2015di owun balaya illanne apata kumak laba dennada?

1981 anka 57 darana werala sanrakshina panathe 15 wana waganthiya prakarawa werala sanrakshana adhikariye adhyakshata, weralata ho muhudu thirayata haniwana kisidu idikirimak kirimata awasara dimata hakiyawak nomathi athara ewan deyak sandaha awasara labadimath, werala athulu samudra parisara paddhathiyata hani kirimen balapawathna nithi paddhathi anuwa thahanam kriyawaki.

inpasuwa widyalankara widyodaya piriwen walin adhyapanaya labuha. 1963 mayi masa 31 dina malwathu parshwaye mangala uposhathagarayedi adhisil labuha.anathuruwa jayawardhanapura wishwawidyalayen shasthracharya shasthrapathi aacharya upadhiya labagath unwahanse. 1976di guru sewayata athulathwa adhyapanika sewa katayuthu kaleya.

bhasha thunenma me upades kruminashaka, walnashaka ha rasayanika pohora dawatanawala athulath kirimata rajaya prathipaththimaya lesa thiranaya kara athi bawath idiri kalaya thuladi gasat pathrayak mangin prakashayata pathkarana bawath amathiwaraya prakasha kaleya."kruminashaka, walnashaka ha rasayanika pohora welandapole nikuth kirima gowinta pamanakya" yanna aniwarya kirima, bala wayas daruwanta eewa alewiya sampurnayenma thahanam kirima, gowin wisin eewa kshethrayedi bhawitha karana witadi thibena aarakshitha upades kriyathmaka kirima aniwarya kirima yanadiya me nawa nithi lesa kriyathmaka kere.pramithiyakin thorawa gowi janathawa kruminashaka, walnashaka ha rasayanika pohora bhawitha kirima warthamanayedi barapathala gataluwak wi atha.
janapriya niliya, hondama niliya athulu sammana rasak dina athi oba me labu upahara sammanaya gana mokada hithanne ?
